author: jochembrouwer
content: Hi all, I think the v12 version of the test suite is incorrect. At EthereumJS we now have failing tests on e.g. Chainstart/Frontier, for instance state test `HighGasPrice`. Any other clients experiencing this as well?

author: jochembrouwer
content: On these tests, there are invalid txs provided, so the state root of the chain should not change. However, in the tests, it does change. (And only on chainstart/homestead/tangerine whistle, from spurious dragon all is fine)

author: jochembrouwer
content: Ok, looks like something in the state runner has changed
